data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Li, Hu, Dai, Ren-Huai, Li, Zi-Zhong (2017): Leafhopper subgenus Pedionis (Pedionis) Hamilton, 1980 (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Macropsinae) with new species, record, combination and synonymy from Southern China. Zootaxa 4294 (1): 112-118, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4294.1.5|6 occurrences
